subsection_content:
Are not. Although keloid scars cause itching, pain, and discomfort, they are not harmful to health.
Keloid scars are not infectious, nor are they cancerous. If the patient has had one keloid scar, it is likely that there will be other keloid scars. Keloid scars do not fade over time. To reduce the appearance of keloid scars, patients should see a dermatologist for early examination and treatment.
Keloid scars are not dangerous to health but cause discomfort for the patient
